full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 82 of 261 1243
LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross
1 Q. You also starred in a reality show, didn't you?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. And that reality show had to do with individuals who wanted to make it in Hollywood; correct?
4
5 A. Yes.
6 Q. And what period of time were you involved in that?
7 A. I don't recall exactly, but I believe it was probably about 19 years ago.
8
9 Q. 19 years ago?
10 A. Probably around then.
11 Q. And in light of the visa that you had, you were committed to work in that industry; correct?
12
13 A. I didn't have a visa at that time. I had not moved to the United States yet.
14
15 Q. So it was after you did the reality show that you then moved to the United States?
16
17 A. At some point later.
18 Q. And when you moved to the United States, it was at that time that you were in the music business?
19
20 A. Yes.
21 Q. And the purpose of your visa at that time was to permit you to move to the United States to work in the music industry; correct?
22
23
24 A. Yes.
25 Q. You no longer are in the music industry; correct?
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018419
